structures

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.CircularShape
      • structures.MovableCircularShape
        • structures.Ball

  • public class Ball
extends MovableCircularShape
    Represents the Movable Ball for the game. Supports resetting operations and capable of generating particles from a collision with another Body.

    The ball's text format is as follows:

  • ball(centerX, centerY, radius, color)
Author:
Sean Lewis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ball()
      Creates the default red Ball at (0,0) with radius 3.

      Creates a red ball with specific center, radius, and color values.

      Creates a ball with specific center, radius, and color values.

      Constructs a Ball in the Ball's text format.
